welcome.title: Welcome to EduFlow
welcome.description: Your all-in-one smart classroom management system. Let's take a quick tour of the features available to you.

role.title: Choose Your Role
role.description: Select between Student, Teacher, or Admin to access role-specific features and dashboards.

timetable.title: Dynamic Timetable
timetable.description: Access AI-powered scheduling with automatic conflict resolution and real-time updates.

transcription.title: Class Transcription
transcription.description: Never miss a lecture with our automated recording and transcription feature.

attendance.title: Real-time Attendance
attendance.description: Track attendance with live updates and comprehensive historical data.

student.title: Student Portal
student.description: Access your timetable, attendance records, and class transcripts

teacher.title: Teacher Dashboard
teacher.description: Manage classes, input subjects, and track student attendance

admin.title: Admin Panel
admin.description: Oversee system resources, generate reports, and manage users
